TextBlock.Text: DEUTZIA: The most likely reason for the <color=orange>Warp Stabilizer</color> to not activate is due to insufficient power.

DEUTZIA: The <color=orange>Warp Stabilizer</color> can be primed by attempting to activate it 4 times. While primed, the <color=orange>Warp Stabilizer</color> will activate immediately once power is restored.

DEUTZIA: Keep in mind the <color=orange>Warp Stabilizer</color> will not be able to fix [SP NAME] on its own in the event of warp-induced damage. For this reason, is is extremely important to activate the <color=orange>Warp Stabilizer</color> before warping.
